CONTENT.p_1: As a Frontend Developer and UI/UX-Designer I have been working on making beautiful things for beautiful people for about a year now.
CONTENT.p_1_1: Despite spending way too much time in front of a screen ever since my youth, I only discovered my passion for coding during my B.Sc. in Psychology while processing and visualizing survey data in R. Soon after I started attending workshops organized by the awesome PyLadies Hamburg in which I learned Python and messed around with my Raspberry Pi. Eventually I started learning web development with Python/Flask and learned JavaScript soon after.
CONTENT.p_1_2: Nowadays I develop web applications in Angular and am loving (almost) every minute of it.
CONTENT.p_2: When I'm not working or studying for my Master's in Software Engineering, I go on long walks with my dog Dobby, try out new recipes or attempt baking tasty things.
